DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Levonorgestrel/Ethinyl Estradiol ( LNG/EE ) effective treating symptom severe Premenstrual Dysphoric Disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Combination Levonorgestrel Ethinyl Estradiol Pre-Menstrual Dysphoric Disorder
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy , woman age 18 49 year . History severe PMS symptom last year , determine investigator . Regular 21 35 day menstrual cycle 2 month prior first study visit . Major depressive disorder require antidepressant treatment hospitalization within last 3 year . Contraindication combination oral contraceptive . Use antidepressants/anxiolytics within 10 day screen duration study . Other exclusion applies .
